page.title: 03WILBERFOSS LEISURE
page.content: People in the village spend their leisure time in lots of different ways. Some of the most popular activities are football,swimming, reading and pub and club-going.Some of the girls go to brownies or guides in the village and some of the boys go to cubs or scouts,although there is not an organisation in the village at present. Some of the older boys and girls go to a recently started youth club where there are games such as table tennis, darts,pool and a tuck shop.Discos are held and outings are arranged. A popular trip is to Brad- ford ice rink. There is a pub in the village called"The Oddfellow's Arms"and a sports club where most serious drink- ing is done. At Easter there is an Easter bonnet parade,in summer a Donkey Derby.
